description: Marilla is the main laundress at the Little Lambs Laundry, where members of the http://anidb.net/ch92207 [Principal Team] were sent to investigate the Poison Gas Jack case. She was responsible for everyone`s welfare and later appointed as a foreman, after http://anidb.net/ch88463 [Princess Charlotte] bought the laundry and her team finished their mission.
name: Marilla
